FuncDef: This command configures the rebind-timer (T2), the time at which the client contacts any available server to extend the lifetimes of the addresses or prefixes assigned to the client.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of days of a rebind timer. Values-0 to 14.
Specifies the number of hours of a rebind timer. Values-0 to 23.
Specifies the number of minutes of a rebind timer. Values-0 to 59.
Specifies the number of seconds of a rebind timer. Values-0 to 59.
